comment: * A policy class that describes how managed SIM subscriptions should behave on the device.

variables.name: TYPE_ALL_PERSONAL_SUBSCRIPTIONS
variables.comment: * Represents default policy to not have any managed subscriptions on the device.

variables.name: TYPE_ALL_MANAGED_SUBSCRIPTIONS
variables.comment:
* Represents policy to have only managed subscriptions on the device, any existing and * future subscriptions on the device are exclusively associated with the managed profile. * *

When a subscription is associated with the managed profile, incoming/outgoing calls and * text message using that subscription would only work via apps on managed profile. * Also, Call logs and messages would be accessible only from the managed profile.

methods.name: public int getPolicyType()
methods.comment:
* Returns the type of managed subscriptions policy, or {@link #TYPE_ALL_PERSONAL_SUBSCRIPTIONS}
     * if no policy has been set.
     *
     * @return The policy type.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
public static ManagedSubscriptionsPolicy readFromXml(@NonNull TypedXmlPullParser parser)
public void saveToXml(TypedXmlSerializer out) throws IOException

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
public static ManagedSubscriptionsPolicy readFromXml(@NonNull TypedXmlPullParser parser)
